--- update_then_return_with_action.sql
update foo set foo = bar, bar = foo, baz = DEFAULT where foo = 1 then return with action *
--- AST
&ast.Update{
  TableName: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 7,
        NameEnd: 10,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Updates: []ast.UpdateItem{
    &ast.UpdateItemSetValue{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 15,
          NameEnd: 18,
          Name:    "foo",
        },
      },
      DefaultExpr: &ast.DefaultExpr{
        DefaultPos: -1,
        Expr:       &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 21,
          NameEnd: 24,
          Name:    "bar",
        },
      },
    },
    &ast.UpdateItemSetValue{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 26,
          NameEnd: 29,
          Name:    "bar",
        },
      },
      DefaultExpr: &ast.DefaultExpr{
        DefaultPos: -1,
        Expr:       &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 32,
          NameEnd: 35,
          Name:    "foo",
        },
      },
    },
    &ast.UpdateItemSetValue{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 37,
          NameEnd: 40,
          Name:    "baz",
        },
      },
      DefaultExpr: &ast.DefaultExpr{
        DefaultPos: 43,
        Default:    true,
      },
    },
  },
  Where: &ast.Where{
    Where: 51,
    Expr:  &ast.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "=",
      Left: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 57,
        NameEnd: 60,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 63,
        ValueEnd: 64,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "1",
      },
    },
  },
  ThenReturn: &ast.ThenReturn{
    Then:       65,
    WithAction: &ast.WithAction{
      With:   77,
      Action: 82,
    },
    Items: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 89,
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
UPDATE foo SET foo = bar, bar = foo, baz = DEFAULT WHERE foo = 1 THEN RETURN WITH ACTION *
